The value which was entered for N is 21.5.

N := 21.5.

--------------------------------

Computing the approximate square root of N:

N = 21.5. // number to take the square root of
X = 21.5. // approximate square root of N
Y = 1. // number to add to X to divide by 2 per square root approximation

while loop iteration # 0:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 11.25.
Y = (N / X) = 1.911111111111111111079789715017085427462006919085979461669921875.

while loop iteration # 1:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 6.58055555555555555559410496613281793543137609958648681640625.
Y = (N / X) = 3.26720135078092021956551460615258974939933978021144866943359375.

while loop iteration # 2:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 4.9238784531682378876882300033912542858161032199859619140625.
Y = (N / X) = 4.3664765904540075373667373792585522096487693488597869873046875.

while loop iteration # 3:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 4.64517752181112271274432412582200413453392684459686279296875.
Y = (N / X) = 4.6284560491064501070758441247932069018133915960788726806640625.

while loop iteration # 4:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 4.63681678545878640969324369081050463137216866016387939453125.
Y = (N / X) = 4.636801710049170810630514427685966438730247318744659423828125.

while loop iteration # 5:
X = ((X + Y) / 2) = 4.6368092477539786101618790592482355350512079894542694091796875.
Y = (N / X) = 4.636809247741725142390178948659240631968714296817779541015625.
